title: IRD Covid loan defaults hit $447m as 20,000 small firms fall behind
description: Experts warn the rising defaults could fuel more company liquidations.
content: In addition, tens of billions of dollars worth of extraordinary government grants and loans, including the cashflow lending scheme, helped to keep sole-trader bankruptcies and company liquidations ar… [+3819 chars]
